00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_GACELEMENT_H_OSAFDJ
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_GACELEMENT_H_OSAFDJ
00022 
00023 #include "constraint_equal.h"
00024 #include "../dynamic_constraints/dynamic_new_or.h"
00025 #include "../dynamic_constraints/dynamic_new_and.h"
00026 #include "../dynamic_constraints/unary/dynamic_literal.h"
00027 #include "../dynamic_constraints/unary/dynamic_notinrange.h"

00029 
00030 template<typename VarArray, typename IndexRef, typename VarRef>
00031 struct GACElementConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00032 {
00033   virtual string constraint_name()
00034   { return "GACElement"; }
00035   
00036   VarArray var_array;
00037   IndexRef indexvar;
00038   VarRef resultvar;
00039   DomainInt var_array_min_val;
00040   DomainInt var_array_max_val;
00041   GACElementConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, const IndexRef& _indexvar, const VarRef& _resultvar) :
00042     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), indexvar(_indexvar), resultvar(_resultvar),
00043     var_array_min_val(0), var_array_max_val(0)
00044   { }
00045   
00046   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00047   {
00048     triggerCollection t;
00049     if(var_array.empty())
00050       return t;
00051       
00052     int array_size = var_array.size();
00053     DomainInt min_val = var_array[0].getInitialMin();
00054     DomainInt max_val = var_array[0].getInitialMax();
00055     for(int i = 1; i < array_size; ++i)
00056     {
00057       min_val = min(min_val, var_array[i].getInitialMin());
00058       max_val = max(max_val, var_array[i].getInitialMax());
00059     }
00060     
00061     var_array_min_val = min_val;
00062     var_array_max_val = max_val;
00063     
00064     // DomainInt domain_size = var_array_max_val - var_array_min_val + 1;
00065     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00066     {
00067       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), DomainChanged));
00068     }
00069     
00070     t.push_back(make_trigger(indexvar,
00071                              Trigger(this, array_size), DomainChanged));
00072     
00073     t.push_back(make_trigger(resultvar,
00074                              Trigger(this, array_size + 1), DomainChanged));
00075     return t;
00076   }
00077   
00078   void index_assigned()
00079   {
00080     int index = checked_cast<int>(indexvar.getAssignedValue());
00081     int array_size = var_array.size();
00082     
00083     if(index < 0 || index >= array_size)
00084     {
00085       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00086       return;
00087     }
00088     
00089     var_array[index].setMin(resultvar.getMin());
00090     var_array[index].setMax(resultvar.getMax());
00091     
00092     DomainInt min_val = max(var_array[index].getMin(), resultvar.getMin());
00093     DomainInt max_val = min(var_array[index].getMax(), resultvar.getMax());
00094     
00095     for(DomainInt i = min_val; i <= max_val; ++i)
00096     {
00097       if(!resultvar.inDomain(i))
00098         var_array[index].removeFromDomain(i);
00099     }
00100   }
00101   
00102   BOOL support_for_val_in_result(DomainInt val)
00103   {
00104     int array_size = var_array.size();
00105     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00106     {
00107       if(indexvar.inDomain(i) && var_array[i].inDomain(val))
00108         return true;
00109     }
00110     return false;
00111   }
00112   
00113   BOOL support_for_val_in_index(DomainInt dom_index)
00114   {
00115     int index = checked_cast<int>(dom_index);
00116     DomainInt min_val = max(var_array[index].getMin(), resultvar.getMin());
00117     DomainInt max_val = min(var_array[index].getMax(), resultvar.getMax());
00118     for(DomainInt i = min_val; i <= max_val; ++i)
00119     {
00120       if(var_array[index].inDomain(i) && resultvar.inDomain(i))
00121         return true;
00122     }
00123     return false;
00124   }
00125   
00126   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta)
00127   {
00128     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(GACElement);
00129     int array_size = var_array.size();
00130     // DomainInt domain_size = (var_array_max_val - var_array_min_val + 1);
00131     
00132     if(indexvar.isAssigned())
00133     { index_assigned(); }
00134     
00135     if(prop_val < array_size)
00136     {
00137       if(indexvar.inDomain(prop_val) && !support_for_val_in_index(prop_val))
00138       {
00139         indexvar.removeFromDomain(prop_val);
00140       }
00141       
00142       typename VarArray::value_type& var = var_array[prop_val];
00143       
00144       DomainInt min_val = var.getInitialMin();
00145       DomainInt max_val = var.getInitialMax();
00146       for(DomainInt val = min_val; val <= max_val; ++val)
00147       {
00148         if(!var.inDomain(val) && resultvar.inDomain(val) &&
00149            !support_for_val_in_result(val))
00150         {
00151           resultvar.removeFromDomain(val);
00152         }
00153       }
00154       return;
00155     }
00156     
00157     if(prop_val == array_size)
00158     { // Value got removed from index. Basically have to check everything.
00159       
00160       for(DomainInt i = var_array_min_val; i <= var_array_max_val; ++i)
00161       {
00162         if(resultvar.inDomain(i) && !support_for_val_in_result(i))
00163           resultvar.removeFromDomain(i);
00164       }
00165       return;
00166     }
00167     
00168     D_ASSERT(prop_val == array_size + 1);
00169     
00170     for(int var = 0; var < array_size; ++var)
00171     {
00172       if(indexvar.inDomain(var) && !support_for_val_in_index(var))
00173       {
00174         indexvar.removeFromDomain(var);
00175       }
00176     }
00177   }
00178   
00179   virtual void full_propagate()
00180   {
00181     for(int i=0; i<var_array.size(); i++) {
00182         if(var_array[i].isBound()) {
00183             cerr << "Warning: GACElement is not designed to be used on bound variables and may cause crashes." << endl;
00184         }
00185     }
00186     if(indexvar.isBound() || resultvar.isBound()) {
00187         cerr << "Warning: GACElement is not designed to be used on bound variables and may cause crashes." << endl;
00188     }
00189     indexvar.setMin(0);
00190     indexvar.setMax(var_array.size() - 1);
00191     resultvar.setMin(var_array_min_val);
00192     resultvar.setMax(var_array_max_val);
00193     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size() + 2; ++i)
00194       propagate(i,0);
00195   }
00196   
00197   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00198   {
00199     int length = v_size;
00200     if(v[length-2] < 0 ||
00201        v[length-2] > length - 3)
00202       return false;
00203     return v[checked_cast<int>(v[length-2])] == v[length-1];
00204   }
00205   
00206   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00207   { 
00208     vector<AnyVarRef> array;
00209     array.reserve(var_array.size() + 2);
00210     for(unsigned int i=0;i<var_array.size(); ++i)
00211       array.push_back(var_array[i]);
00212     array.push_back(indexvar);
00213     array.push_back(resultvar);
00214     return array;
00215   }
00216   
00217   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00218   {
00219     DomainInt array_start = max(DomainInt(0), indexvar.getMin());
00220     DomainInt array_end   = min((DomainInt)var_array.size() - 1, indexvar.getMax());
00221 
00222     for(DomainInt i = array_start; i <= array_end; ++i)
00223     {
00224       if(indexvar.inDomain(i))
00225       {
00226         DomainInt dom_start = max(resultvar.getMin(), var_array[i].getMin());
00227         DomainInt dom_end   = min(resultvar.getMax(), var_array[i].getMax());
00228         for(DomainInt domval = dom_start; domval <= dom_end; ++domval)
00229         {
00230           if(var_array[i].inDomain(domval) && resultvar.inDomain(domval))
00231           {
00232             // indexvar = i
00233             assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size(), i));
00234             // resultvar = domval
00235             assignment.push_back(make_pair(var_array.size() + 1, domval));
00236             // vararray[i] = domval
00237             assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, domval));
00238             return true;
00239           }
00240         }
00241       }
00242     }
00243     return false;
00244   }
00245   
00246   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00247   {
00248       // This is a slow-ish temporary solution.
00249       // (i=1 and X[1]!=r) or (i=2 ...
00250       vector<AbstractConstraint*> con;
00251       // or the index is out of range:
00252       vector<int> r; r.push_back(0); r.push_back(var_array.size()-1);
00253       AbstractConstraint* t4=(AbstractConstraint*) new WatchNotInRangeConstraint<IndexRef>(stateObj, indexvar, r);
00254       con.push_back(t4);
00255       
00256       for(int i=0; i<var_array.size(); i++)
00257       {
00258           vector<AbstractConstraint*> con2;
00259           WatchLiteralConstraint<IndexRef>* t=new WatchLiteralConstraint<IndexRef>(stateObj, indexvar, i);
00260           con2.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t);
00261           NeqConstraintBinary<AnyVarRef, VarRef>* t2=new NeqConstraintBinary<AnyVarRef, VarRef>(stateObj, var_array[i], resultvar);
00262           con2.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t2);
00263           
00264           Dynamic_AND* t3= new Dynamic_AND(stateObj, con2);
00265           con.push_back((AbstractConstraint*) t3);
00266       }
00267       
00268       return new Dynamic_OR(stateObj, con);
00269   }
00270 };
00271 
00272 
00273 template<typename Var1, typename Var2>
00274 AbstractConstraint*
00275 BuildCT_GACELEMENT(StateObj* stateObj, const Var1& vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var1& v2, ConstraintBlob&)
00276 { 
00277   return new GACElementConstraint<Var1, typename Var2::value_type, typename Var1::value_type>
00278               (stateObj, vararray, v1[0], v2[0]);  
00279 }
00280 
00281 
00282 template<typename Var1, typename Var2, typename Var3>
00283 AbstractConstraint*
00284 BuildCT_GACELEMENT(StateObj* stateObj, const Var1& vararray, const Var2& v1, const Var3& v2, ConstraintBlob&)
00285 { 
00286   return new GACElementConstraint<Var1, typename Var2::value_type, AnyVarRef>
00287               (stateObj, vararray, v1[0], AnyVarRef(v2[0]));  
00288 }
